name: Clin T Vulva
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:**  When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and information available to assign T, record the T detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage. 

**Note 2:**FIGO Stage IVA is assigned based on tumor extension and/or regional lymph node involvement.  Code primary tumor extension based on a physician's statement of FIGO Stage IVA if it is based on primary tumor extension or the basis is unknown.

**Note 3:**  FIGO no longer includes Stage 0 (Tis) for this site.

**Note 4:**  FIGO Stage I, IA and IB are defined by size of tumor, involvement of vulva OR vulva and perineum, and depth of stromal invasion.

**Note 5:**  The depth of invasion is defined as the measurement of the tumor from the epithelial-stromal junction of the adjacent most superficial dermal papilla to the deepest point of invasion.

**Note 6:** T3 is not used by FIGO. They label it T4. If you have a record which states T4, assign T3.
rows:
Unknown; extension not stated

Not documented in patient record

Carcinoma in situ (preinvasive carcinoma)
Intraepithelial neoplasia Grade III (VIN III)
Tumor confined to vulva or vulva and perineum

Note: T1 has subcategories of T1a and T1b. Assign T1 only when there is no information available to assign one of the subcategories

Vulva and perineum:  Stromal invasion but depth of invasion in millimeters not stated

Invasive carcinoma confined to:
    Musculature
    Submucosa
    Vulva including skin

Localized, NOS

FIGO Stage I [NOS]

Stated as T1 [NOS]
Tumor 2 cm or less in greatest dimension and with stromal invasion no greater than 1.0 mm

Vulva and perineum:  Stromal invasion less than or equal to 1 mm

FIGO Stage IA

Stated as T1a
Tumor greater than 2 cm or with stromal invasion greater than 1mm

Vulva and perineum:   Stromal invasion greater than 1 mm

FIGO Stage IB

Stated as T1b

Tumor of any size with extension to adjacent perineal structures: 
    Anus
    Lower third urethra 
    Lower third vagina

Anus
Perianal skin
Urethra:
     Lower/distal one-third 
    Urethra, NOS 
Vagina (lower/distal 1/3 vagina)
Vagina NOS

FIGO Stage II

Stated as T2

Tumor of any size with extension to the following structures:
    Bladder mucosa
    Fixed to pelvic bone
    Rectal mucosa
    Upper 2/3 urethra
    Upper 2/3 vagina

Bladder wall or bladder, NOS (including mucosa)
Perineal body
Rectal wall or rectum, NOS (including mucosa)
Urethra: upper/proximal two-thirds
Vagina: upper/proximal two-thirds

Further contiguous extension

FIGO Stage IVA based on extension 
     Or unknown whether based on extension or nodes

Stated as T3
